alert.note: Alert for Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Renville County through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Bird Island, or 12 miles northeast of Redwood Falls, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Renville County, including the following locations... Bechyn. This includes U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 86 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
